title: Heart Meditation: Loving Presence (from retreat)(2015-10-12)
description: Heart Meditation: Loving Presence (from retreat)(2015-10-12) - Scanning the body, filling it with the image of a smile, meditation continues with loving presence of someone easy to love, our own being, and offering care to others.
